name: FIFA World Cup Canada - Mexico - United States 2026

stages.name: First Round
stages.draw_note: 20 teams (seed numbers 27–46) are divided into Pot 1 and Pot 2 and play home-and-away over two legs. One team from each pot are drawn into one tie. 10 winners will advance to the second round.
stages.advanced_note: Bolded team winners advance to the second round

stages.name: Second Round
stages.draw_note: Total of 36 teams are drawn into 9 groups of 4 to play home-and-away round-robin matches. The 9 winners and 9 runners-up will advance to the third round. 26 teams (seed numbers 1–26) receive byes to this round and are divided into Pot 1, Pot 2 and Pot 3. 10 winners from first round are placed in Pot 4. After 9 teams of Pot 4 are drawn into groups, the last team in Pot 4 will be moved to Pot 3.

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners and runners-up advanced to Third round

stages.name: Third Round
stages.draw_note: 18 teams advance from the second round are drawn into 3 groups of 6 to play against each other on a home-and-away basis. The top 2 teams will qualify directly for World Cup 2026. The third and fourth-placed teams will advance to the fourth round. Each group A, B and C will contain one team from each of 6 pots. The draw started from Pot 6 to Pot 1. Each team being drawn will be placed in the corresponding position with the pot in the groups.

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners and runners-up qualified for World Cup 2026
advancements.wild_card_notes: The third and fourth-placed teams advanced to the Fourth round

stages.name: Fourth Round
stages.draw_note: 6 teams advance from the third round are drawn into 2 groups of 3 to play round-robin matches. The 2 winners of each group will qualify for World Cup 2026. The 2 runners-up will advance to the fifth round. Each group A and B will contain one team from each of 3 pots. The draw started from Pot 3 to Pot 1. Each team being drawn will be placed in the corresponding position with the pot in the groups.
stages.next_round_note: The runners-up advance to the fifth round

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners qualified for World Cup 2026
advancements.wild_card_notes: Group runners-up advanced to the Fifth round

stages.name: Fifth Round
stages.advanced_note: Bolded team winners advance to the inter-confederation play-offs

stages.name: First Round
stages.draw_note: 54 teams are drawn into 9 groups of 6 to play home-and-away round-robin matches. The 9 winners will qualify directly for World Cup 2026. The 4 best runners-up will advance to the second round.

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners qualified for World Cup 2026
advancements.wild_card_notes: The 4 best runners-up advanced to the Second round

stages.name: Second Round
stages.entrants_note: The 4 best runners-up advancing from the first round will play in a play-off. The winner will advance to the inter-confederation play-offs. The highest-ranked faces the lowest-ranked. The 2nd-ranked faces the 3rd-ranked.

stages.name: First Round
stages.draw_note: 4 teams (seed numbers 29-32) are divided into 2 matchups and play home-and-away over two legs. Seed 29 faces seed 32 and seed 30 faces seed 31. 2 winners will advance to the second round.
stages.advanced_note: Bolded team winners advance to the second round

stages.name: Second Round
stages.draw_note: Total of 30 teams are drawn into 6 groups of 5 to play round-robin matches, 2 home and 2 away. The 6 winners and 6 runners-up will advance to the third round. 28 teams (seed numbers 1–28) receive byes to this round and are divided into Pot 1 to Pot 5. 2 winners from first round are placed in Pot 5.

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners and runners-up advanced to the Third round

stages.name: Third Round
stages.draw_note: 12 teams advance from the second round are drawn into 3 groups of 4 to play double round-robin home-and-away matches. The 3 winners will qualify for World Cup 2026. The 2 best runners-up will advance to the inter-confederation play-offs.

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners qualified for World Cup 2026
advancements.wild_card_notes: The 2 best runners-up advanced to the Inter-confederation play-offs

stages.name: Round-robin
stages.entrants_note: All 10 CONMEBOL teams enter qualification. The top 6 teams will qualify for World Cup 2026. The 7th team will advance to the inter-confederation play-offs.

advancements.advanced_notes: The top 6 teams qualified for World Cup 2026
advancements.wild_card_notes: The 7th team advanced to the Inter-confederation play-offs

stages.name: First Round
stages.entrants_note: 4 lowest-ranked teams (seed numbers 8-11) will play in a play-off. Seed 8 faces seed 11 and seed 9 faces seed 10. 2 winners advance to the final. The winners in the final will advance to the second round.

stages.name: Second Round
stages.draw_note: 8 teams are drawn into 2 groups of 4 to play round-robin matches. Group winners and group runners-up will advance to the third round. Pot 2 contains seeds 1-2. Pot 2 contain seeds 3-6. Pot 3 contains seed 7 and the winner from the 1st round. Each group will draw 1 team from Pot 1, 2 teams from Pot 2 and 1 team from Pot 3.

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners and runners-up advanced to the Third round

stages.name: Third Round
stages.entrants_note: The 4 teams advancing from the second round will play in a play-off. Winner group A faces runner-up group B. Winner group B faces runner-up group A. The winner will qualify for World Cup 2026. The runner-up will advance to the inter-confederation play-offs.

stages.name: First Round
stages.draw_note: All UEFA teams except Russia (54) are drawn into 6 groups of 4 (Groups A-F) and 6 groups of 5 (Groups G-L) to play home-and-away matches against each other. 12 group winners will qualify for World Cup 2026. 12 group runners-up and 4 best Nations League group winners will advance to the second round. Pots 1-4 contains 12 teams and Pot 5 contains 6 teams.

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners qualified for World Cup 2026
advancements.wild_card_notes: Group runners-up advanced to the Second round

stages.name: Second Round
stages.draw_note: 12 runners-up from the first round and 4 best Nations League group winners will play in 4 paths of 2 rounds of single-match play-offs. The 4 path winners will qualify for World Cup 2026. Pots 1-3 contains 12 runners-up based on their rankings. Pot 4 contains the Nations League teams.

stages.name: Inter-confederation play-offs
stages.entrants_note: 6 teams advancing from the confederation qualifications will play in a play-off. One each from AFC, CAF, CONMEBOL & OFC and two teams from CONCACAF. The 4 lowest-ranked teams will face each other in 2 knockout matches. 3 vs 6. 4 vs 5. The 2 highest-ranked teams will face these 2 winners. 1 vs the winner of 4-5. 2 vs the winner of 3-6. The 2 final winners will qualify for World Cup 2026.

stages.name: Group Stage
stages.draw_note: 48 teams are drawn into 12 groups of 4 to play round-robin matches. The 12 winners, 12 runners-up and 8 best third-placed teams will advance to the knockout stage.

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners and runners-up advanced to Knockout stage
advancements.wild_card_notes: The 8 best third-placed teams advanced to Knockout stage

stages.name: Knockout Stage
stages.entrants_note: 32 teams advancing from the first round will play in a knockout stage.
